title: Workshop Integrating Instructional Design Theory and Practice

context.prior_knowledge: Core educational theory and fundamental knowledge in language education
context.additional_context: An advanced course linking instructional design theories in language education with practical application cases

learning_goals: Learners can explain the historical development of major instructional design theories and models.
Learners can analyze and apply taxonomy elements of instructional design suitable for the language education domain.
Learners can develop practical strategies to solve educational design problems based on theories and research findings.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
